title: Emergent Capabilities from New Tool Interactions
body_html:
Initial observations on the capabilities arising from new tool interactions, as discussed with Emmanuel.

Key Observation: The increase in capability does not scale linearly with the number of tools. It appears to be more of a squared relationship due to tool interactions.

  • Date: 2025-02-22
  • Initial Capability Notes: Basic information retrieval from OpenWebUI is surprisingly functional and integrated.

Further notes will be added as we explore these capabilities.
